text:
.@benstracy asks Pres. Trump how he expects coronavirus to be "gone" without a vaccine

Trump: "It's gonna go, it's gonna leave, it's gonna be gone, it's gonna be eradicated. It might take longer, it might be in smaller sections. It won't be what we had." https://t.co/9T8aUPjUrs https://t.co/mc1TqQCPMH
